All Classes

Class
Description
AnimalDen
A class for declaring the animal den of the given player.
Board
The class that creates the board given the number of rows and columns
BoardTableModel
A class to set the table model of the board (JTable)
Cat
A class to declare a Cat piece
Dog
A class to declare a Dog piece
Elephant
A class to declare an Elephant piece
GameGUI
The view of the game
GameImages
A class used to get the images file path
GameManager
The controller that handles the game (GameGUI and Board)
GamePoint
A class used for the positioning of the animal pieces.
GameSounds
A class used to get the sound file path
GameState
Enumeration of various kinds of status the game state will be in.
ImageRenderer
A renderer class used to render images of the game on board.
InitPiecePos
A class containing the initial positions of animal pieces.
InstructionsController
 
Leopard
A class to declare a Leopard piece
Lion
A class to declare a Lion piece
Main
A class to start the application
MainManager
The controller for the main menu (Menu, Instructions, and Turn GUI/Controller)
MenuController
 
Mouse
A class to declare a Mouse piece
Piece
An abstract class for declaring the animal pieces depending on the given animal type.
PieceLabel
A JLabel class to draw circle/oval behind pieces
PieceType
Enumeration of different animals
Player
A class for declaring a new Player depending on given type of player
PlayerType
Enumeration of Player types returning the respective color of each player
PlaySound
A class that plays used to play game sounds.
River
A class for declaring the river.
RiverJump
An interface that classifies if an animal is able to jump across the river
RiverMove
An interface that classifies if the animal can move in the river
Tiger
A class to declare a Tiger piece
Tile
A class that is mainly used as a data type for the creation of the board.
TileType
Enumeration of different types of game objects
Trap
A class that manages the traps
TurnController
 
Wolf
A class to declare a Wolf piece
